details:
noun
- domestic swine
= example: domestic swine
= synonyms: pig, grunter, squealer
- a sheep up to the age of one year
= example: a sheep up to the age of one year
= synonyms: hogget, hogg
- a person regarded as greedy and pig-like
= example: a person regarded as greedy and pig-like
= synonyms: pig
verb
- take greedily
= example: take greedily
